PHRASE.LANG: Those monkeys may think no-one's watching them, but you hunted them down! [#Legal]
Ces singes croyaient être passés inaperçus, mais vous n'avez pas perdu leur trace ! [#Legal]
Diese Affen glauben vielleicht, dass sie niemand beobachtet, aber du hast sie erwischt! [#Legal]
Quei birbanti pensano di non essere osservati, non sanno che li hai scovati! [#Legal]
Puede que esos monos se crean que no los ve nadie, ¡pero tú les has dado caza! [#Legal]
Those monkeys may think no-one's watching them, but you hunted them down! [#Legal]
Those monkeys may think no-one's watching them, but you hunted them down! [#Legal]
